FRD.name: First Road
FRD.desc: This is a normal road, nothing peculiar.

items.desc: A key is lying on the ground, next to the trashcan.
items.take: You pick the key up off the ground.

BUSP.name: Bus Stop
BUSP.desc: This is the place where you get on bus normally.

SRD.name: Second Road
SRD.desc: This is a normal road, nothing peculiar.

TRD.name: Third Road
TRD.desc: The weather drastically changed. A storm is coming!

LOAB.name: Lobby of the Academy Building
LOAB.desc: 'Strange... When was it built? Why haven't I ever noticed this building?'

CNR.name: Conference
CNR.desc: Hmmm, it must have been a while since last time it was visited. So much dust... Ewww, spiders...

items.desc: Unlike any other thing in this building, this pack of bullets are shinny, as if it was just produced from the factory.
items.take: You pick the pack of bullets.

MLR.name: Mailroom
MLR.desc: It was abandoned a long time ago, the calendar on the wall reads '13th Mar 1947'.

items.desc: I'm no expert but I can definitely tell this thing is aged. Not sure if it even works had I pulled the trigger.
items.take: You pick the gun from the desk.

LEH.name: Lecture Hall
LEH.desc: This room smells filthy... I should leave now.
